i5.las2peer.security

Class ServiceInfoAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.Agent
      • i5.las2peer.security.PassphraseAgent
        • i5.las2peer.security.ServiceInfoAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlAble, MessageReceiver, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ServiceInfoAgent
extends PassphraseAgent
    This Agent is a public single instance agent for the solely purpose of keeping (loosely) track of all registered services in the network
